verse:
पुरुष एवेद सर्वं यद्भूतं यच्च भाव्यम्।
उतामृतत्वस्येशानो यदन्नेनातिरोहति॥

terms.पुरुष (purusha): the Supreme Being, the essence of all existence

meaning: Meaning:Indeed, the Supreme Being is the essence of all that has happened and all that will happen. Moreover, as the controller of immortality, He transcends even through food.
